metadata.title: CVE-2020-24825 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in the line_table::line_table function of Libelfin v0.3allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) through a segmentationfault via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: libelfin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
